Playbacks are intended to allow contributors to present a proposal or provide progress on a particular feature, to get feedback from the community. There will be a best effort to hold these on Monday and Tuesday at 10:00 - 11:00 EST to accommodate different geos and work week schedules. Weekly scrums are a great place to propose topics and get on the agenda. #fabric-scrum

You will notice a column for a scribe. The role of the scribe is to assist the presenter by taking notes and summarizing key points in the appropriate Jira items.

Please look for web conference information in the #fabric-playbacks channel prior to meeting starting.

Date Time (EST) Topic Presenter Scribe Recording
Nov 13, 2017 10:00 - 11:00 Identity Mixer Maria Dubovitskaya, Manu Drijvers Manu/Maria
Nov 14, 2017 10:00 - 11:00 Distinguish MSP Identity Types Angelo De Caro Elli Androulaki ?
